ch.cern.dbod.ui.components

Class SnapshotCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zk.ui.AbstractComponent
      • org.zkoss.zk.ui.HtmlBasedComponent
        • org.zkoss.zul.impl.XulElement
          • org.zkoss.zul.Calendar
            • ch.cern.dbod.ui.components.SnapshotCalendar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, org.zkoss.zk.ui.Component, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.Scope, org.zkoss.zk.ui.sys.ComponentCtrl

    public class SnapshotCalendar
extends org.zkoss.zul.Calendar
    Customized calendar to mark days for snapshots (it should be used with the correspondent script markSnapshots.js included in the page).
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setSnapshots

        public void setSnapshots(List<Snapshot> snapshots)
        Setter for the snapshots. It formats the dates in the snapshot list passed as a parameter and return a list of string with the formatted dates.
        Parameters:
        snapshots - list of formatted dates.
